_header: The boars head in hands I bring
_description: A Boar’s Head carol — three quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘Caput apri Refero / Resonens laudes domino’

OxfBal354.First Lines:
The boris hed in hondis I bryngeWith garlondis gay & byrdis
                    syngnge…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…He taketh his leve & goth a wayExiuit tunc de
                        patria
